text: Ndipo awerengere iwo za nkhani ya Nowa pamene iye adanena kwa anthu ake kuti: “oh! Inu anthu anga! Ngati muli kuipidwa ndi kukhala kwanga pakati panu ndi kukukumbutsani mawu a Mulungu, dziwani kuti ine ndaika chikhulupiliro changa mwa Mulungu motero inu musonkhanitse zopanga zanu ndi mafano anu ndipo inu musapange chiwembu mseri ayi. Gamulani chiweruzo chanu pa ine ndipo musandipatse nthawi ayi.”
